currentProject.quote: Jordan led a very large effort to migrate a client's technical stack. This was an arduous process, requiring the migration of a massive amount of custom modules from an inherited codebase. This project required a great deal of coordination across a large team, which Jordan led with tremendous poise, skill, and humility. <mark>Jordan's dedication, determination and leadership was key to this project's success.</mark>
